= How to use django-survey with Pinax=

django-survey can be integrated easily into [http://code.google.com/p/django-hotclub/ django-hotclub].
You can now from a tribe answer the related survey and add/update/delete Survey/Question/Choice.

= Step by step =

1. Download the patch to django-hotclub and apply it attached [http://code.google.com/p/django-survey/issues/detail?id=11 there]
2. Download the [http://code.google.com/p/django-survey/issues/detail?id=11 templates] and unzip them into django-hotclub's template directory
